    public class Trime
extends InputMethodService
implements KeyboardView.OnKeyboardActionListener, Candidate.CandidateListener

      • onKey

        public void onKey(int primaryCode,
                  int mask)
        從接口複製的說明: KeyboardView.OnKeyboardActionListener
        Send a key press to the listener.
        指定者:
        onKey 在接口中 KeyboardView.OnKeyboardActionListener
        參數:
        primaryCode - this is the key that was pressed
        mask - the codes for all the possible alternative keys with the primary code being the first. If the primary key code is a single character such as an alphabet or number or symbol, the alternatives will include other characters that may be on the same key or adjacent keys. These codes are useful to correct for accidental presses of a key adjacent to the intended key.

      • commitEventText

        public void commitEventText(CharSequence text)

      • onText

        public void onText(CharSequence text)
        從接口複製的說明: KeyboardView.OnKeyboardActionListener
        Sends a sequence of characters to the listener.
        指定者:
        onText 在接口中 KeyboardView.OnKeyboardActionListener
        參數:
        text - the sequence of characters to be displayed.

      • onPress

        public void onPress(int primaryCode)
        從接口複製的說明: KeyboardView.OnKeyboardActionListener
        Called when the user presses a key. This is sent before the KeyboardView.OnKeyboardActionListener.onKey(int, int) is called. For keys that repeat, this is only called once.
        指定者:
        onPress 在接口中 KeyboardView.OnKeyboardActionListener
        參數:
        primaryCode - the unicode of the key being pressed. If the touch is not on a valid key, the value will be zero.

      • onRelease

        public void onRelease(int primaryCode)
        從接口複製的說明: KeyboardView.OnKeyboardActionListener
        Called when the user releases a key. This is sent after the KeyboardView.OnKeyboardActionListener.onKey(int, int) is called. For keys that repeat, this is only called once.
        指定者:
        onRelease 在接口中 KeyboardView.OnKeyboardActionListener
        參數:
        primaryCode - the code of the key that was released
